Home » 40P9 Dhammapaccanīya (2), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3)
6 Sahetukadukādi, Kusalattika
Sahetukadukādi, Kusalattika
33.
91Nasahetukaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasahetuko nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—  vicikicchāsahagataṃ uddhaccasahagataṃ mohaṃ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ, ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paṭicca tayo mahābhūtā…pe…  dve mahābhūte…pe…  nasahetukaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naahetuko nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—  vicikicchāsahagataṃ uddhaccasahagataṃ mohaṃ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā; paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṃ paṭicca sahetukā khandhā. Nasahetukaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasahetuko nakusalo ca naahetuko nakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (3)
92Naahetukaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naahetuko nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā…  tīṇi.
93Nasahetukaṃ nakusalañca naahetukaṃ nakusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasahetuko nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā…  tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
94Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā pañca…pe…  avigate nava.
34.
95Nasahetukaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasahetuko naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā…  tīṇi.
96Naahetukaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naahetuko naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā…  tīṇi.
97Nasahetukaṃ naakusalañca naahetukaṃ naakusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasahetuko naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā…  tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
98Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca…pe…  aññamaññe cha…pe…  purejāte āsevane dve…pe…  avigate nava.
35.
99Nasahetukaṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naahetuko naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
100Naahetukaṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naahetuko naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
101Nasahetukaṃ naabyākatañca naahetukaṃ naabyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naahetuko naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
102Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe pañca, adhipatiyā ekaṃ…pe…  avigate pañca.
103(Hetusampayuttadukaṃ sahetukadukasadisaṃ.)
